feed.title: Big Cheeks
feed.subtitle: I like to build stuff and make them look appealing and interactive.

entry.title: Welcome to my blog!
entry.content:
Hello worlds always felt a bit sad to me, because it’s the kind of project you won’t ever touch again after you complete. Almost like drinking a can of coke when you’re in need of a sugar rush. You have that initial moment of satisfaction, then feel silly and want to drop the thing in the trash to move on and forget about it.

Anyway, hello world!

You have that initial moment of satisfaction, then feel silly and want to drop the thing in the trash to move on and forget about it.
